name: Expedition Eden
description:
An ambitious junior research assistant participates in an expedition back to our abandoned Earth to search for definite proof of a valuable plant. Eager to prove himself, he takes off alone into the desolate wilderness but quickly gets more than he bargained for when equipment breaks, the toxic air pollutes his mind and a terrifying creature that should not be alive lurks nearby.

The game was made as part of a course in Game World Design by:

  • Casper Boonen
  • Romi Geleijn
  • Helene Kathinka Kjær Kirkegaard
  • Martin Robert Krøse
  • Tamás Lakatos
  • Julia van Straaten

And a special thanks to William Horslund who created the music!
